headline: Assessing HP (HPQ) Valuation After A Steep Pullback And Low P/E Signal
summary: HP stock performance snapshot HP (HPQ) has seen a series of negative returns recently, including a 2.8% decline over the past day and a 6.1% decline over the past week, which may catch income and value focused investors’ attention. Over the past month and past 3 months, the stock has recorded declines of 14.9% and 28.4% respectively, while the 1 year total return stands at a 37.2% decline, setting the backdrop for a closer look at the business.
